author: upayavira
msg: Moved Target into a separate class (ready for holding more complex URI arithmetic that I will extract from the CocoonBean)
Moved error detection to correct place in Main from Wrapper

author: mpo
msg: Adding the new ContinuationsDisposer interface declaring the callback for implementation specific Clean-up of continuations.
See initial proposal of http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=xml-cocoon-dev&m=105948225805344&w=2
